title: Homepage
seoDesc: Hobbyist Digital Artist from Hungary - My artwork, OCs, and contact information
avatarBasedOn: Current avatar based on the work of <1>{{basedOnArtist}}</1>

quote.text: Creativity is contagious. Pass it on.

aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.p1: I’m a hobbyist digital artist who loves drawing animals in his free time. My personal favourite species are foxes, but I like canines in general, besides other four-legged creatures. I consider myself to be part of the larger furry community. I occasionally participate in related events to relax, or to hang out with friends.
aboutMe.p2: In addition to creating art myself, I also have a tendency to support independent artists from the furry fandom in the form of purchasing commissions featuring various original characters, ranging from my own to friends’ or even the artists’.
aboutMe.p3: When I'm not drawing, my favorite activities include listening to music, watching movies or series, and playing video games. You can find my favourites at the links in the contact section below. My native language is Hungarian, but I'm also fluent in English and I'm actively trying to learn Russian.

artwork.heading: Recent Artwork
artwork.p1: Normally this section would display a neat gallery of my recent artwork from Furbooru but it seems for one reason or another it could not be loaded at the moment. Maybe their servers are overwhelmed or there's a glitch in the Matrix, we may never know.
artwork.p2: Fear not, for this placeholder text shall bring your attention to the button below which links to my artist tag where you will be able to see all the same works (provided the site itself is still alive and well).
artwork.p3: It might not be as fancy as this awesome gallery I had set up for you here, but it is what it is, I don't make the rules. It's a shame really, I would have loved for you to see it. Maybe check back a bit later? Sorry :(

myOC.heading: My Original Characters
myOC.artAlt: A light blue pony and fox standing on opposite sides of a transparent barrier, placing their feet on said barrier at the same height on their own side
myOC.p1: I'm a proud owner of not one, but two original characters. Or, well, depends on how you define “original”. While their color schemes might be exactly the same and they might have very similar personality traits… Okay, fine, you caught me, she's basically a single character with two different forms, but the two forms count as separate characters in my book.
myOC.p2: Her name is {{name}}, but for her friends it's simply {{nick}}. If you want to find out more about her I suggest you check out the reference sheet linked below. It will also explain the strange name choice if you are curious about the reasoning behind it.

contact.heading: Contact & Social Media
contact.p1: Here you’ll find a list of websites and apps I have accounts on. If you need to get in touch with me use whichever one is closest to the top when possible.
